title: Mini-Ep 84: Nip It in the Bud
itunes:title: Mini-Ep 84: Nip It in the Bud
itunes:subtitle: Doree and Kate hear from listeners attending a concert together in Los Angeles, read an email from a listener dealing with homesickness, share self-care tips for nurses sent in by nurse listeners, and discuss how to handle a boss’s relentless criticism...
description:
Doree and Kate hear from listeners attending a concert together in Los Angeles, read an email from a listener dealing with homesickness, share self-care tips for nurses sent in by nurse listeners, and discuss how to handle a boss’s relentless criticism.


To leave a voicemail for a future episode, call 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.


This episode is sponsored by:

  • Beauty Pie - To get your first month free, visit beautypie.com today and use code Forever35.
  • Honeybook - Get 50% off your first year when you go to tryhoneybook.com/forever35.
  • Thirdlove - Get 15% off your first purchase when you go to thirdlove.com/forever.
  • Native - For 20% off your first purchase visit nativedeodorant.com and use promo code FOREVER35 at checkout.
  • Molekule - use code FOREVER10 at checkout to get 10% off your first air purifier order at molekule.com.
  • Bombas - For 20% off your first purchase of Bombas, visit bombas.com/forever35.


Theme music by Riot.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
